skills.skill: BGP, EIGRP, OSPF, MPLS, VRF, QoS, PBR, VSS, HSRP, STP

duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide daily support of LAN, WAN, Wireless, and Network Trading Infrastructures.
Monitor network performance and capacity planning, and recommend improvements.
Complete project tasks/milestones and BAU work as a member of the Network Operations team.
Perform written Root Cause Analysis documents for network outages and incidents.
Resolve incidents, problems, and change requests within approved maintenance windows.
Conduct complex migrations/upgrades and deploy new technologies/features.
Develop professional diagrams and illustrations of network infrastructure.
Research industry trends and become familiar with the laws and regulations of the firm.
Utilize company resources to improve processes and procedures for the team.
Update internal systems with the most current data and/or information.
Assist with preparing information and research materials for review.
Attend meetings, events, and other networking opportunities.
Support disaster recovery, change management, logging and alerting, and incident response.

education_certification.credential: 4-year degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or Management Information Systems or relevant experience/certifications
